title.native: 真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
title.romaji: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita
title.english: Banished from the Hero’s Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside

description:
A heroic and mighty adventurer dreams of...opening a pharmacy?

Red was once a part of the Hero’s party, a group destined to save the world by fighting the Raging Demon Lord. But after being betrayed by his comrade, Red hopes to start anew by opening a small apothecary in a sleepy town on the frontier. While keeping his past life a secret is the goal, it won’t be easy...especially when a beautiful adventurer from his past asks to move in.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: Banished from the Heroes' Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside
ผมโดนกลุ่มผู้กล้าขับไส เลยต้องไปสโลว์ไลฟ์ที่ชายแดน
Banished from the brave man's group, I decided to lead a slow life in the back country.
I Was Kicked out of the Hero’s Party Because I Wasn’t a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

Illustrator for Nijisanji VTubers Himawari Honma, [Saku Sasaki](https://anilist.co/character/221854), and Yuzu Hassaku.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.
